maqras.text: exalted est Unus whose manus est totus kingship He est Omnipotent
Unus created decessus vita distinguishing those among vos bonus He est Almighty the Forgiving
He created 7 universes in layers Vos non vide any imperfection creation de the Multus Gracious. Keep looking vos vide any flaw
Look again ac again tuus eyes advenit stumped conquered
Nos adorned inferior universe lamps custos its finis cum projectiles devils nos prepared them retribution Hell
Pro those disbelieved their Dominus retribution Gehenna. Quod miserable destiny
When they thrown therein they hear its furor it fumes
It fere explodes rage Whenever group thrown therein its custos est ask them vos non receive warner
They answer Sic indeed; warner perfecit advenit nos nos disbelieved dictus â€˜DEUS non reveal anything! Vos est totally astray
They alias dictus nos heard understood nos non est dwellers Hell
Sic they confessed their sins Woe to dwellers Hell
Prout pro those reverence their Dominus when alone in their privacy they attained forgiveness major recompense
Vos keep tuus utterances secret declare them He est fully aware de innermost thoughts
He non know quod He Should created He est Sublime Cognizant
He est Unus put Terra tuus service Roam its corners eat His provisions To Eum est ultimus summoning
Vos guaranteed ut Unus caelum non strike terra causa it perfecit tumble
Vos guaranteed Unus caelum non send vos violent storm Vos tunc appreciate value My warning
Others them disbelieved quam terrible est My requital
they non vide birds habuit them lined columns spreading their wings The Multus Gracious est Unus habuit them in the air He est Seer totus things
ubi those militis est help vos contra the Multus Gracious? Indeed disbelievers deceived
Qui est ibi to provisus pro vos He withholds His provisions Indeed they plunged deep into transgression aversion
Unus walks dum est slumped his face bene guided 1 qui walks straight rectus path
dictus He est 1 initiated vos granted vos hearing eyes brains. Rarely est vos appreciative
dictus He est Unus locus vos terra ac Eum vos summoned
They challenge When ut prophecy advenit pass vos est truthful
Dictus Such knowledge est DEUS; ego est non multus than manifest warner
When they vide it happening faces de those disbelieved turn miserable proclaimed Hoc est quod vos used mock
Dictus DEUS decides annihilate me those withme shower nos cum His mercy est ibi protect disbelievers painful retribution
dictus He est the Multus Gracious; nos believe in Eum nos trust Eum. Vos perfecit surely invenit out qui est really far astray
Dictus Quod si tuus aqua sinks away qui provisus vos perfecit pure aqua
